name: Brittle Blade
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam 31 (https://itch.io/jam/godot-wild-jam-31).

In this game, you've lost your sword, and have to make do with the stalactites that fall from the ceiling. Each stalactite is brittle, so it has only one use. After that, it breaks, and you are missing a weapon until another one falls.

Special thanks to TheLine for making the music for me, you can check out his work here:

https://twitter.com/LiningEnd729

https://soundcloud.com/liningend-729
